description: Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! A simple but addictive puzzle game.

title: Hextris
description: Fast-paced puzzle game inspired by Tetris. Rotate the hexagon to match colors.

title: Doodle Jump
description: Jump as high as you can! Avoid monsters and broken platforms.

title: Pac-Man
description: The classic arcade legend. Eat all the dots and avoid the ghosts.

title: Snake
description: The timeless classic. Eat the apples, grow longer, and don't hit the walls.

title: Flappy Bird
description: Flap your wings and avoid the pipes. How far can you go?

title: Tetris
description: The ultimate block-stacking puzzle game. Clear lines and score big.

title: Crossy Road
description: Why did the chicken cross the road? Find out in this endless hopper.
